description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the information disclosure vulnerability in Windows kernel-mode drivers (CVE-2024-38256), follow these steps:

1. Download and apply the KB5043064 update for your system from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Restart your system to ensure the applied changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the vulnerability by ensuring proper initialization of resources within the kernel, preventing unauthorized information disclosure.
- Available for the following systems:
  - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems
  - Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64 and 32-bit Systems
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64 and 32-bit Systems
- For manual installation, download from:
  - [KB5043083](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043083)
  - [KB5043064](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043064)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a supported version of Windows 10.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
